text: The de Havilland Aircraft Company Limited was a British aircraft manufacturer, founded in 1920 by Geoffrey de Havilland. It was based in Hatfield, Hertfordshire. De Havilland produced the first jet-powered passenger aircraft.Failure Analysis Case Studies II, Vol. II, ed. David R. H. Jones (Amsterdam; Oxford: Elsevier, 2001), p. 185 == References == == Other websites == *de Havilland Aircraft Museum Category:Aircraft companies Category:1920 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1964 disestablishments Category:1960s disestablishments in England Category:Manufacturing companies of the United Kingdom
title: De Havilland
